notes.text:
This update fixes the following security issue:

    * CVE-2014-9556: An integer overflow in the function qtmd_decompress()
      could have been exploited causing a denial of service (endless loop)
      (bnc##912214)

Security Issues:

    * CVE-2014-9556
      <http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2014-9556>
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Integer overflow in the qtmd_decompress function in libmspack 0.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (hang) via a crafted CAB file, which triggers an infinite loop.
notes.title: CVE description
